descriptions: Kobalt high quality hand tools are crafted for the professional, as well as the do-it-yourself and home owner
Chrome vanadium blades for extra strength

reviews.title: "Easy Peasey"
reviews.text: All sorts of different heads, star, square, Alan, and you basic standard and Phillips. Great value for price.
reviews.author: Wesley

reviews.title: "Good set at a great price"
reviews.text: Great variety, but I thought (by the title) that the entire set was magnetic. Only the multi bit driver is.
reviews.author: Case

reviews.title: "Great value and quality"
reviews.text: I can tell its made from quality materials and will do the job
reviews.author: Glean

reviews.title: "Kobalt 29-piece Magnetic-bit Screwdriver set"
reviews.text: Ever have a small screw or nut you just can't hang on to. this is the perfect solution. This set is better then a shirt pocket. No more dropped tips or small nut and screws.
reviews.author: Randy

reviews.title: "Kobalt 29-Piece Magnetic Multi-Bit Screwdriver Set"
reviews.text: Great set for a great price. Versatile and very easy grip on the handles. Bought it for use in the house, but will probably make it the 'go to' set for all jobs.
reviews.author: Rhonda

reviews.title: "Screw Driver Set"
reviews.text: Great affordable price. A very good set of screw drivers. The set has about any scew driver you would ever need.
reviews.author: Joe

reviews.title: "Excellent basic set, but not the best from Kobalt"
reviews.text: I'm glad they came out with this because I enjoy using the other Kobalt screwdrivers. I have a multi-bit screwdriver that has the same handle shape as this and I've wanted to get more. You can tell that these are a bit cheaper than the nice bigger sets Kobalt currently also retails. What I'm talking about is the blue grip on the screwdrivers themselves having less grip pattern on it, lacking the hex/scaling entirely. That really added a nice touch on the previous drivers in my opinion. What is nice though is the hanging loop at the top which can also be used for extra torque by inserting another screwdriver and making a "T shape" handle. The precision screwdrivers also feel a bit cheaper than what you'll get with the dark blue Kobalt precision set (The one with the hardcase). These in comparison have very loose end caps and don't have the bright markings to indicate which is which. I'll be keeping this set as my easy-reach set for small things, while keeping my other ones in the workshop area for bigger projects.
reviews.author: J

reviews.title: "Nice set for price"
reviews.text: Fairly good quality for the price . Grips are comfortable and tips have solid so far. May upgrade to 5 stars later if they cont to hold up.
reviews.author: Dan

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: James

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Yulissa

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Yulissa

reviews.title: "For non-professional use ok"
reviews.text: Quality for the price very good and competitive. Not professional grade but for every day use at home/garage more than enough.
reviews.author: Ed

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: AC

reviews.title: "Nice set."
reviews.text: Its a nice set.  Would have been better if they included some of the square bits.
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Screwdriver set"
reviews.text: Kobalt tools are top notch. My husband can't seem to find a screwdriver when he needs it. I bought him that set along with a bag to keep it in. He was so pleased he asked for your $99 kobalt tool set in a traveling suitcase for part of his Christmas. I bought that as well. Price and quality top motch
reviews.author: Elaine

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Renodiva

reviews.text: There is no review to accompany this rating.
reviews.author: Jon

reviews.title: "Kobalt 29 Piece Magnetic  Multi Bit Screwdriver Se"
reviews.text: Very useful for me to get work done around the house.
reviews.author: John

reviews.title: "Great little set at a greater price"
reviews.text: So far it has been a great little set.  I threw mine in my tool chest, but if you don't have a "screwdriver" drawer it might be tough to store. This set must cover most of the needs for most people.  Especially like the tiny drivers, which come in so handy.
reviews.author: blubull

reviews.title: "Good deal"
reviews.text: I really like this product especially the magnetic tip screwdrivers was working in tight confined space and need to make sure my screws and get lost so this product was perfect for the job and that the price point I definitely recommend it
reviews.author: Kemp

reviews.title: "a darn good product"
reviews.text: I have bought several Kobalt products in the past month and am really please with the price and quality.  Kobalt makes products that stand to compete with Craftsman … all good products.
reviews.author: none

reviews.title: "Great Set - Incredible Blackfriday Price"
reviews.text: I was looking for a screwdriver set, and honestly I was surprised to not find as many as I figured would be out there. Nice set for a heck of a deal on blackfriday.
reviews.author: Brian

reviews.title: "Quick screwdriver set"
reviews.text: Decent enough to handle the job. Comfortable and feels good. Solid weight. I'm sure it will do the job for most home needs.
reviews.author: Stud

reviews.title: "Nice gift"
reviews.text: I bought these as a gift. They are good quality and a good value. A handy toolset with lots of sizes in philips and regular. The grips are comfortable.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "Kitchen Set"
reviews.text: Keep this in the kitchen tool draw for quick access.  great variety to take care of those small problems around the house without going into the garage
reviews.author: Cloyce

reviews.title: "Home owner Essential"
reviews.text: Electric drivers are not effective all the time and there might be situations where you need to do it old school and also for hard to reach places.
reviews.author: Sam

reviews.title: "Kobalt screwdriver set"
reviews.text: I really like the quality of the kobalt screwdriverset that I purchased from Lowe's .I would recommend them to anyone shopping for screedrivers.
reviews.author: Bill

reviews.title: "29 Piece Screwdriver Set"
reviews.text: Bought these to work in Small Engines on my Lawnmowers and Snowblowers. Came in Handy with all the different Bits that came with this Kit!
reviews.author: Dave

reviews.title: "Great Screwdriver Set"
reviews.text: Great set of screwdrivers.  I think they are well made and will last for me for years. You get a great variety of different screw drivers.
reviews.author: Gunrunner

reviews.title: "Great value"
reviews.text: Working as expected at very good price! I ordered it online and had my wife pick it up later in the store near her office. So convenient!
reviews.author: LqV

reviews.title: "Kobalt 29-Piece Magnetic Multi-Bit Screwdriver Set"
reviews.text: What a great deal!  These are high quality, comfortable to use and lifetime guaranteed.  Intended as gift, but I think I'll keep them.
reviews.author: AxeMan

reviews.title: "Great bundle!"
reviews.text: They are very heavy duty and I know they'll last a long time. All the great sizes including the very small hard to get screwdrivers
reviews.author: Dwin

reviews.title: "Nice set of screwdrivers"
reviews.text: I bought this set as a gift for someone who needed a matching set.  Price was great and the handles are ergonomic and easy to use.
reviews.author: jimbop

reviews.title: "Good value"
reviews.text: This Kobalt 29 piece is a good value. It's always good to have an extra set of screw drivers handy on the garage and in the home.
reviews.author: David

reviews.title: "Screwdriver set"
reviews.text: Screwdriver set Works as it should have not tried anything crazy with them so I don't know what they can really hold up to
reviews.author: Steve

reviews.title: "Screwdriver set."
reviews.text: They feel a little light and cheap, but I have not had them long enough to know if the blades will last. So far so good.
reviews.author: Boburk

reviews.title: "Worth the money"
reviews.text: Nice size and gripp-my handles.  Only .com is that the larger straight blade should be longer, like the larger philips.
reviews.author: FRShaffer

reviews.title: "nice set"
reviews.text: I purchased this 1/2 off on Black Friday. Great Deal.  Set seems sturdy to last a long time and like the color.
reviews.author: Trish

reviews.title: "Good screwdrivers"
reviews.text: These have worked well. 4 stars because the handles are on the bulky side. Otherwise they are what was needing
reviews.author: EAnderson

reviews.title: "Description is short but detailed of product"
reviews.text: I'm glad I purchased this item. It offers heat versatility without buying more than needed. Great value.
reviews.author: Jim

reviews.title: "Driver set"
reviews.text: Kobalt is my favorite brand when it comes to Hand tools.  reliable and their warranty is second to none
reviews.author: Mike

reviews.title: "Kobalt magnetic screwdrivers"
reviews.text: Love this set. It has everything I need for household repairs requiring a screwdriver. Great price
reviews.author: Happy

reviews.title: "Great Product"
reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife who has RA. She loves the handles cause they are easy for her to grip.

reviews.title: "great price, great tool!"

reviews.text: comfortable to hold, magnetic tip, great overall value and lifetime guarantee..

reviews.text: They are everything I expected and work great for my needs.

questions.question: "Are the bits and screwdrivers magnetic or just the bit holder?"
"Just wanted to point out, unlike a reviewer said below, these DO include square bits: S1, S2, and S3 to be exact."
